name: Shantae
synopsis: Take control of Shantae, the hair-whipping belly dancing Guardian Genie of Scuttle Town. In the adventure that started it all, Shantae pursues the nefarious lady pirate Risky Boots through burning deserts, twisting labyrinths and haunted forests in search of magical components that could mark the end of Sequin Land. Make friends, battle monsters and take down steam-powered pirates – it’s all in a day’s work for Shantae! - A platform/quest game of epic proportions! - Whip monsters using Shantae’s magical ponytail. - Belly dance to transform into a monkey, elephant, spider and more! - Over 50 enemy packed locations that change from day to night. - Power up with magical items, relics and fighter’s gear. - Dance Parlor, Gecko Match and footrace mini games! - Multistage boss battles and a killer soundtrack!
